text:
It looks like Halsey isn't so "Bad at Love" after all.

Halsey and G-Eazy are collaborating on more than just studio smashes like their platinum-certified single "Him & I" these days: The pop star and rapper, who were first rumored to be dating back in August 2017, have quickly become the king and queen of music industry PDA.

From booty-grabbing at the beach to gushing about one another to magazines, the two artists can't seem to get enough of each other, especially when they're on stage or attending an event together.

Below, check out ten of Halsey and G-Eazy's cutest photos as a couple.
title: Halsey and G-Eazy’s Cutest Moments as a Couple (PHOTOS)
